original_text: After the sixty-two ‘sevens,’ the Anointed One will be put to death and will have nothing. The people of the ruler who will come will destroy the city and the sanctuary. The end will come like a flood: War will continue until the end, and desolations have been decreed.
korean_text: 예순두 이레 후에 기름 부음을 받은 자가 끊어져 없어질 것이며 장차 한 왕의 백성이 와서 그 성읍과 성소를 무너뜨리려니와 그의 마지막은 홍수에 휩쓸림 같을 것이며 또 끝까지 전쟁이 있으리니 황폐할 것이 작정되었느니라

sentences.original_text: Anointed One will be put to death
sentences.korean_translation: 기름부음을 받은 자가 죽임을 당할 것이며

sentences.original_text: The people of the ruler who will come
will destroy the city and the sanctuary.
The end will come like a flood:
War will continue until the end,
